quote: The first generation home buyer needs an advocate. They don't have people that can say, are you kidding me? This furnace hasn't been cleaned in 30 years.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the need for advocacy and support for first-generation home buyers.
suggested_hook: Why first-generation home buyers need a strong advocate in their corner.

quote: The bottlenecking right now in real estate across the country has to do with sellers saying, where am I going to go? And I don't want to give up my 2% or 3% mortgage.
why_clipworthy: Addresses a current market challenge affecting inventory and sales.
suggested_hook: Why are so many homeowners staying put in today's market?
